data.title: carlafitzgerald
data.meta_description: Marketing expert offering Clear Communications, Bold Strategies, Creative Ideas, Masterful Execution and Contagious Energy.  Experienced in SaaS, Wireless, Mobile, Enterprise Software, IoT, Telematics for B2B, SMB, Enterprise and Consumer Markets. Visit www.CarlaFitzgerald.com.
data.text:
MicroStrategy – Chief Marketing Officer (2023 - Present)

The MicroStrategy ONE platform provides access to AI-powered workflows, unlimited data sources, cloud-native technologies, and unparalleled performance to speed up time from data to action.

​

BigBear.ai – Chief Marketing Officer (2022)

AI-powered analytics and cyber engineering solutions for the U.S.Dept of Defense and Intelligence agencies, as well as commercial healthcare, manufacturing, supply chain, and space industries.

Innovyze/Autodesk – Marketing Consultant (2020-2021)

Software and SaaS solutions for the water industry, including modeling, simulation, analytics, asset management, AI/ML, and digital twin technology.

SYSPRO USA – Marketing Consultant (2020-2021)

ERP software and SaaS solutions for mid-market manufacturers and distributors.

​

Xunison – Marketing Consultant (2021)

Smart home devices, operator management platform, and consumer mobile apps for connected living, including parental controls, energy management, home network security, etc.

Spireon – Chief Marketing Officer (2016-2019)

Vehicle telematics solutions for automotive and transportation industries, offering SaaS IoT platform, telematics devices, and mobile applications to SMB and enterprise customers.

Smith Micro Software - Chief Marketing Officer (2011-2016)

Wireless and mobility solutions for network operators, mobile device manufacturers, and enterprises. Also offering graphic design software direct to consumers via e-commerce platform. (NYSE:SMSI)

​

WebVisible – Vice President of Marketing (2010-2011)

Search marketing SaaS platform and advertising consulting for SMB service industries.

YouMail – Marketing Consultant (2008 – 2010)

Robocall blocking and visual voicemail mobile services.

​

Logical Apps – Vice President of Marketing (2005 - 2007)

Governance, Risk and Compliance (GRC) software and consulting services for audit and finance departments. (Acquired by Oracle)

Bitfone Corporation – Vice President of Marketing (2003 - 2005)

Mobile Device Management software for device manufacturers and wireless network operators. (Acquired by HP)

​

Octave Software – Vice President of Marketing (2001-2002)

Web Content Management software for enterprise IT.

Quest Software – Vice President of Marketing (1999-2000)

Systems and Application Management software for enterprise IT (IPO)

​

Computer Associates – Various Marketing and Technical Roles (1988-1998)
